verses.roman:
jagannātha hana kṛṣṇera 'ātma-svarupa'
kintu ihāṅ dāru-brahma--sthāvara-svarūpa

synonyms: jagannātha—Lord Jagannātha; hana—is; kṛṣṇera ātma-svarūpa—identical with Kṛṣṇa; kintu—but; ihāṅ—here, at Jagannātha Purī; dāru-brahma—the Absolute appearing as wood; sthāvara-svarūpa—nonmoving identity.
translation: "There is no difference between Lord Jagannātha and Kṛṣṇa, but here Lord Jagannātha is fixed as the Absolute Person appearing in wood. Therefore He does not move.
